item.title: Francis Poulenc: Novelette in C Major
item.description: Francis Poulenc: Novelette in C major played by Adrian de Lima - 2017-01-15 18:15:18-1 Presumably played in preparation for an ABRSM piano exam, this video of Adrian playing the piano with his piano teacher Nicky was uploaded by Mum, 16 Jan 2017
